artist: Artist: Itō Shinsui; Publisher: Watanabe Shōzaburō
description: bust portrait of young woman wearing an orange kimono with geometric flower patterns, grey collar with pastel flowers and red and white obi, arranging her hair
inscription: 昭和九年三月 {Shōwa kunen sangatsu} (March 1934)
markings: red artist\'s seal: 深水 {Shinsui} | publisher seal: 版権所有渡邊庄三郎 {hanken shoyū Watanabe Shōzaburō} (copyright Watanabe Shōzaburō) | on back, red seal: 貮百五拾枚絶版　第貮百五拾番 {nihyakugojū mai zeppan, dai nihyakugojū ban} (edition of 250, number 250) | red square publisher seal: わたなべ {Watanabe}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From The Second Collection of Modern Beauties (Gendai bijin shū dai nishū 現代美人集第二輯)
title: Doing the Hair
